response.original_title: Sagrada Terra Especulada - A Luta Contra o Setor Noroeste
response.overview: The film Sagrada Terra Especulada, the fight against the Northwest Sector narrates a period of struggles against the Northwest Sector, an upscale neighborhood built by real estate speculation in the Federal District. Focusing on the struggle carried out since the Santuário dos Pajés Indigenous Reserve, the film traces the actions of the media, politicians, businessmen, speculators and bureaucrats: all at the service of profit/segregation. On the other hand, it presents the action of popular movements in an inc.
response.title: Sagrada Terra Especulada - A Luta Contra o Setor Noroeste
